name: DoxyMentor
short_description: DoxyMentor makes autogeneration of software project documentation a snap, by utliizing DoxyMake (and doxygen), and a source code repository.  Supports exporting tagged modules from cvs and documenting them based on a short-and-sweet Doxymake config file.
